clinical_history: Patient with neurological deficits referred for brain PET-CT.
findings: Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
Focal increased uptake in right lung upper lobe, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in right lung upper lobe with SUVmax 4.45.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
recommendations: Correlate with MRI/CT for precise anatomical localization.
